Package com.ibm.fhir.schema.patch

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.fhir.schema.patch.Main
  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to patch an old schema for use-cases which fall outside the standard automatic schema migration process
